column4: guys, firefox 2.0 is crashing when I try to open http://www.cnn.com/2006/AUTOS/carreviews/03/01/cr_reliability/index.html do you have any suggestions?
what kind of error do you get? segmentation fault?
go into terminal, open firefox and go to that link. and then see what exit message is inputed to the terminal
open firefox and go to the link
and when firefox just closes, there will be an error message in the terminal
I did, firefox closes but I don't see anything on the console
do i have to open firefox from the terminal?
ok sorry then, how do i do that? :)
firefox was crashing even before that, I don't think that had to do with it
did you upgrade distro or anythign recently?
yeah, last night upgraded from 6.06 to 6.10
but it was crasing even before that
updating distro versions usually gives unstability..i'd recommend a clean install of edgy...
